title: Tout de Sweet
name: Tout de Sweet
description:
A Map by Baostar

All about sugar.

properties.name: Billy's Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Baostar184 9th Ave, NYC 10011Billy\'s Bakery is the brainchild of Billy Reece, a former Magnolia manager. His bakeshop has all the same smells, tastes, and ambience you\'ve come to love from that other bakery, but with none of the crowds (yet). The menu is filled with banana cream, pineapple upside-down, and seasonal-fruit pies; plain, autumn, and chocolate cheesecakes; and cupcakes in basic (yellow and chocolate) and special (German chocolate, devil\'s food) flavors. Their signature is the banana cake with cream-cheese frosting.

properties.name: Black Sheep Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Kbeadle 107 se Washington Street, Portland, Oregon 97214Today I went to one of the Black Sheep Bakery outlets http://blacksheepbakery.com/site/687531/page/474549 (Portland Farmers Market at PSU park blocks). I went early, got my coffee and promptly walked over to their booth for a carrot cupcake. Then I saw some sort of berry pastry. I don\'t know what it is called but I bought it (along with the carrot cupcake). This new berry pastry thing was really good. Really, really good and vegan. I guess I will have to arrive early next week to find out more. I don\'t know if they sell their goods at their headquarters. It may be you have to visit one of their outlets. I know they sell muffin and mix packages online and wholesale.

properties.name: Boule
properties.description: Posted by Cryztalvisions 420 North La Cienega BLVD, Los Angeles, CA 90048Fabulous delectable chocolate creations that are almost too pretty too eat. Exquisite tastes, friendly people, who could ask for more? Wonderful gifts for the chocolate lover in your life, Boule packages their scrumptious morsels in simple and beautifully elegant way. Joan Collins has been seen buying treats here. Don\'t miss their delicious sorbets and ice cream. Local pickup and delivery available as well as online shopping.

properties.name: Cake Love
properties.description: Posted by Baostar1506 U Street Northwest, Washington, DC, 20009202-588-7100 FoodTV Warren Brown\'s bakery in D.C.

properties.name: Charles Chocolates Test Store
properties.description: Posted by Baostar3527 California Street, San Francisco, CA 94118A temporary Laurel Heights confectionery.

properties.name: Chocolate, Banana, Whipped Cream and Ice-Cream Crepe
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing Need I say more? It is a crying shame that the chairs are so horrendously uncomfortable. I guess that\'s their way of limiting how long people sit and use the free wifi over a cup of coffee.

properties.name: CocoaLoco
properties.description: Posted by BaostarBene Bene, Cabot Place, Canary Wharf, E14 Rich, chocolatey, moist and slightly gooey brownies!

properties.name: Confiserie Sprungli
properties.description: Posted by BaostarBahnhofstrasse 21, 8100 Zürich, SwitzerlandNot many people know that Lindt company name is actually Lindt & Sprungli. Lindt focuses exclusively on chocolates, while Sprungli offers a while range of cakes, chocolates and cookies. Confiserie Sprungli uses chocolate from Lindt to make their truffles, but they are a completely different company and all products are made separately. The main draw is the batch of colorful macaroons.

properties.name: Crave Cookies & Cakes Inc
properties.description: Posted by Markus1107 Kensington Road NW, Calgary, AB T2N 3P2, CanadaCupcakes, cookies, and cakes.

properties.name: Cubcake Royale (and the old Majestic theater)
properties.description: Posted by Jodopod  2052 nw Market street, seattle, WA

properties.name: Dahlia Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 2001 4th Ave, Seattle, WADahlia Bakery (206) 441-4540 The Dahlia Bakery is located right next to the Dahlia Lounge, along 4th Avenue between Virginia and Lenora. This tiny store front bakery allows you to take home the delicious desserts and breads served in Douglas\' four restaurants. All of the bakery\'s offerings are baked on the premises, in our pastry kitchen headed by pastry chef Patric Gabre-Kidan. With a focus on seasonality and local produce our unique selection of tarts, pies, cakes and cookies, is always evolving, while traditional favorites such as our triple coconut cream pie are always available. Rustic artisan breads (the same that are served in the restaurants) are baked by head bread baker Gwen Grande. Also from the bread ovens are convenient savory items such as 3-seed breadsticks, semolina flatbread, and herb crostini to carry home for easy entertaining. The kitchen for the Dahlia Lounge serves seasonal lunches in the bakery daily, with a selection of sandwiches, soups, salads and other delicious culinary treats. Sit out front or take it to go.

properties.name: Dainties Cupcakes
properties.description: Posted by Baostar11058 Santa Monica Blvd., Los Angeles, CAWhat: Rich chocolate cupcakes filled with caramel, coconut, and other flavored whipped creams.Why: Purely devil’s food.When: Tues.-Fri., 10 a.m.-6 p.m.; Sat., 8 a.m.-4 p.m.Where: 11058 Santa Monica Blvd., b/t Sepulveda Blvd. & Camden Ave., West L.A. (310-312-3656).-- Delivered by Feed43 service

properties.name: Dufflet Pastries
properties.description: Posted by Designingmama   "Nothing artificial, always delightful." True to their word, Dufflet Pastries use only all natural ingredients. This little bakeshop and cafe up on Yonge is a wonderful place to go for a "coffee" with your little one. My daughter adores their cupcakes and I love their coffee and chocolate mousse tarts (an amazing each!). They also serve yummy samosas!

properties.name: French Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  404 NW 10th ave, Portland, ORI\'m not sure of the name because I find their logo illegible, but a French bakery recently opened up downstairs from the Platial HQ. Now our stairway smells of both flowers and bread. Very nice. The bakery has a cart set up on the street where they sell coffee and sweets. The macaroons are amazing! Just like Paris! I almost couldn\'t believe it.

properties.name: Frosted Cupcakery
properties.description: Posted by Baostar195 Claremont Ave, Long Beach, CA 90803Joining the ranks of other cupcake boutiques is the Frosted Cupcakery in Belmont Shore.

properties.name: Ganache Patisserie
properties.description: Posted by Daibo1262 Homer Street, Vancouver, BC CanadaFrench style patisserie with rich cakes, tarts, cookies, and confections (truffles, pate de fruit, etc.).

properties.name: Ganache Patisserie
properties.description: Posted by DaiboFrench style bakery with rich cakes, cookies, and confections (truffles, chocolates, pate de fruit, etc).

properties.name: Helen Bernhard Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Kbeadle1717 Broadway St., Portland, OR 97232This place has been around since 1924 and it is darn good. They have wedding cakes, pies, breads, sweets...yum. Since I am not allowed to eat all of these sweets I simply get a powdered sugar cake donut. Then I stroll down to Halo and look at shoes.

properties.name: La Rue du Chocolat
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 448 South Coast Highway, Suite B, Laguna Beach, California 92651Charming shop with chocolate-dipped strawberries, truffles, handmade confections and other fine candies. Special gifts and custom chocolate boxes available. Next to the pepper tree in historic Peppertree Lane.

properties.name: Love at First Bite
properties.description: Posted by Baostar1510 Walnut Street, Berkeley, CA, 94709Deborah Im ditched the bloodthirsty world of corporate law for the fuzzier terrain of cupcakes, cookies, and bread puddings. The shop carries indulgences like PB Affair (Reese\'s-topped chocolate cupcakes), Mud Pie (chocolate cupcakes with mocha frosting and Oreo bits), and Red Hot Love (red velvet cupcakes with cream cheese frosting).

properties.name: Magnolia Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Jason401 Bleecker St, NYUndisputedly the best cupcakes in New York City.

properties.name: Matty Cakes
properties.description: Posted by Blissfulglutton 1830 Piedmont Ave NE, Atlanta, GAhttp://blissfulglutton.blogspot.com/2005/09/matty-cakes-atlanta.html

properties.name: Miette Confiserie
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 449 Octavia Boulevard, San Francisco, CA 94102A sophisticated sweet shop from the gals behind those ridiculous French macarons at the Ferry Building.

properties.name: Pix Patisserie
properties.description: Posted by Rupi 3402 SE Division, Portland, ORMy favorite place in PDX to get dessert. They are beautiful and yummy. Great wine and beer list, cosy environment and friendly staff.

properties.name: Recchiuti Confections
properties.description: Posted by Baostar1 Ferry Building 30, Shop #30, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Saint Cupcake
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor407 Nw 17th Ave, Portland, ORPatron Saint of Sweet. New cupcake shop and now the backdrop to the gingerbread altar made by Emiko.

properties.name: Sprinkles Cupcakes
properties.description: Posted by Baostar9635 Little Santa Monica Boulevard, Beverly HillsSprinkles Cupcakes is a charming new cupcake shop on Little Santa Monica. Rich, flavorful frosting and cake that\'s neither too dense nor too airy set apart the bakery\'s toothsome delights. For neo-traditionalists, there\'s pure-as-snow coconut with coconut-cream-cheese frosting. The red velvet will make even steel magnolias swoon. And don\'t miss the precious minis, custom loot bags for parties, and treats for furry friends.

properties.name: Sprinkles Cupcakes
properties.description: Posted by Baostar944 Avocado Ave., Newport Beach, CASprinkles Cupcakes finally opened at Corona Del Mar Plaza. It\'s party time!

properties.name: SusieCakes
properties.description: Posted by Baostar11708 San Vicente Boulevard, Brentwood, CA SusieCakes offers frosting-filled cupcake and just-like-Mom-used-to-make birthday cakes. Their retro treats like chocolate wafer icebox cake, banana pudding with vanilla wafers, and Whoopie pies are devourable for any occasion.

properties.name: Sweet Lady Jane Bakery
properties.description: Posted by System8360 Melrose Ave, West Hollywood, CASweet Lady Jane Bakery (323) 653-7145

properties.name: Sweet Table
properties.description: Posted by Baostar3056 N. Lincoln Ave., ChicagoFilipino-influenced sweets are the main draw here, and they are definitely some of the best (and freshest) in the city. Baked daily, the kitchen whips up beautiful blueberry and apricot rugalach, fat rounds of Hawaiian bread, cake-like donuts (perfect for dunking in one of its coffees), decadent bite-size walnut well pies and baby strawberry tartlets filled with creamy pudding and topped with fresh berries.

properties.name: SweetCake
properties.description: Posted by Baostar5825 West Sunset Boulevard, Suite 112, Hollywood, CASweetCake provides exquisite homemade pastries for caterers and restaurants, and, now, for at-home diners. The Small Bites menu includes quaint lemon meringue tartlets with shortbread crust, tiny bittersweet chocolate boxes with chocolate ganache and cashew caramel, and chic French macaroons in lemon, pistachio, or raspberry - can lend you the gourmet flair you\'re after. And once you try the cookies and custard shooters and see how easy it is to order them for your next cocktail party. Tastings at the private kitchen on Sunset are encouraged, so make an appointment to try some. You’ll find that they taste as good as they look.

properties.name: Tate's Bake Shop
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 43 North Sea Road, Southampton, New York 11968Once upon a time, on a beautiful farm in the Hamptons, a little girl named Kathleen - just 11 years old, began baking cookies to sell at her family\'s farm stand to make money for fun summer outfits. Soon, her tasty, buttery treats became known across the land and a fledgling business was started. Now over 20 years later, the passion still burns bright and Tate\'s Bake Shop still holds to Kathleen\'s original principles. The storybook bakery still uses fresh, quality ingredients to make the addictive little treats that you\'re sure to enjoy. Taste them yourself... after all these years, it\'s still about the mmm! (tatesbakeshop.com)

properties.name: Teacake Bake Shop
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  5615 Bay Street, Emeryville, CAThis warm and homey, the adorable pink Emeryville shop uses quality ingredients, like Belgian chocolate and sweet cream butter, turning out small batches of goodies throughout the day so everything is straight out of the oven.

properties.name: The Bluebird Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Baostar8572 National Boulevard, Culver City, California 90232Bluebird bakery offers some homey cakes, pies, and petits fours in an Italy-meets-Vermont cafe in an industrial section of Culver City.

properties.name: The Candy Baron
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 231 Forest Ave., Laguna Beach, CA 92651

properties.name: Three Square Bakery and Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  1121 Abbot Kinney Boulevard, Venice, CAThree Square offers breakfast baked goods like ginger scones and strawberry danishes with Julius Meinl coffee. There are also cookies, tarts, fresh breads, teas and spreads you can pickup for later.

properties.name: Vivace Crepes
properties.description: Posted by Jason(503) 228-3667 - in a cool old victorian house, lots of laptops, saggy chairs, many rooms

properties.name: Wonderland Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Baostar1314 Bison, Newport Beach, CAA new and enchanted bakery that opened across from The Bluffs in Newport Beach.

properties.name: Yummy Cupcakes
properties.description: Posted by Baostar2918 W. Magnolia Blvd., Burbank, CANew Burbank bakery Yummy Cupcakes has the ultimate treat for finicky snackers: a custom cupcake bar. Start with a chocolate or vanilla base, add a little (or a lot of) frosting, then top that baby off with sprinkles, crushed cookies, gummies, whipped cream, or fruit zests.
